Crimes.Crime_Name: Driving with ability impaired by alcohol
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Human rights complaint regarding discrimination based on alcohol dependence
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Commission erred in declaring the complaint trivial, frivolous, vexatious, or made in bad faith under paragraph 41(1)(d) of the CHRA
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Judicial review of Commission's decision not to proceed with complaint
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: No new evidence found; complaint rehashed previously dismissed issues
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Complaint declared inadmissible as frivolous and vexatious

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Human rights complaint following dismissal for performance and alcohol-related issues
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Commission erred in refusing to hear the complaint under paragraph 41(1)(d) of the CHRA
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Post-grievance judicial review of Commission's refusal to investigate
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Investigator found no new evidence; prior adjudication had addressed the matter
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Complaint dismissed as frivolous and vexatious

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to comply with employment conditions
Crimes.Dispute_Type: Discrimination complaint related to alcohol dependence during employment probation
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of Commission's decision not to deal with the complaint under CHRA paragraph 41(1)(d)
Crimes.Outcome: Judicial review application dismissed; Commission's decision upheld
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Alleged discrimination due to alcohol dependence not accommodated
Crimes.Evaluation_Standard: Reasonableness standard applied to Commission's decision
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Complaint previously dismissed by PSSRB; no new evidence presented

Crimes.Dispute_Type: Human rights complaint alleging discrimination due to drinking problem after dismissal during probation
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the Commission erred in refusing to hear the complaint under paragraph 41(1)(d) of the CHRA
Crimes.Procedural_Stage: Judicial review following Commission's refusal to proceed
Crimes.Evidence_Assessment: Same arguments already rejected by grievance adjudicator; no new evidence
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Complaint deemed frivolous and not pursued by Commission
